text: Beaumerie-Saint-Martin is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A village situated some 1.5 miles(3 km) southeast of Montreuil-sur-Mer, on the D349 road. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Beaumerie-Saint-Martin
